query: SELECT city FROM sportset_2 WHERE stadium LIKE '%Center%' AND attendance < capacity
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT city) FROM sportset_2 WHERE state = 'Louisiana' AND year >= 2016 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT city, COUNT(*) FROM sportset_2 WHERE attendance > capacity AND season = 2018 GROUP BY city HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT DISTINCT stadium FROM sportset_2 WHERE month LIKE '%March%' AND year = 2019 ORDER BY stadium LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sportset_2 WHERE city = 'Orlando' AND attendance > capacity * 0.8 GROUP BY season HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
SELECT DISTINCT month FROM sportset_2 WHERE state = 'Florida' AND (year = 2016 OR year = 2017) ORDER BY month
